plentry.pd:
Whether to stop playing music files and audio mixing when leaving the channel:
: (Default) Stop playing music files and audio mixing.
: Do not stop playing music files and audio mixing.

Whether to stop playing sound effects when leaving the channel:
: (Default) Stop playing sound effects.
: Do not stop playing sound effects.

Whether to stop microphone recording when leaving the channel:
: (Default) Stop microphone recording.
: Do not stop microphone recording.

Whether to stop playing music files and audio mixing when leaving the channel:
: (default) Stop playing music files and audio mixing.
: Do not stop playing music files and audio mixing.

Whether to stop playing sound effects when leaving the channel:
: (default) Stop playing sound effects.
: Do not stop playing sound effects.

Whether to stop microphone capture when leaving the channel:
: (default) Stop microphone capture.
: Do not stop microphone capture.

: Do not stop playing music files and audio mixing.
